artist: Artist: Ōkura Kōtō; Publisher: Takekawa Risaburō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: horizontal ōban; battle scene; several figures charging up a mountain; large rock formation lined with trees in center; walled structure surrounded by plumes of smoke located to the right of the rock; wall continues behind rock in center left; faint view of the roof of a house behind left wall; group of soldiers charging and firing cannons in LRC; roof in flames in top center
inscription: on back, in pencil, in LLC: 08 06872 VH
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Rear Attack
